name: Ghost Blazer Demo
description:
Ghost blazer is an experimental demo of a modern lightgun game.
It uses the mouse cursor as a target to shoot the enemies.
You can use a Wii remote with a sensor to control the cursor.
Gun4IR and other similar lightgun solutions should also work,
but I do not own any, so I have not tested them.
The game also includes a white border for the Sinden lightgun, but I do not have a Sinden Lightgun to test. I also do not have enough knowledge of how the Sinden lightgun works.
If you want to test a Lightgun and report in the comments about it,
you are welcome to do so.
I will try to find out more information about Lightguns.

The game itself is simple. You are in a forest at night,
and an endless horde of evil Spirits attacks you.
You have to shoot the spirits before
they can reach you and hurt you.

If your health drops to zero, the game ends.
